articles.title: The startups threatened by Epic's new AI
articles.summary: All the artificial intelligence news out of Epic's big customer event in Wisconsin. Plus: Great stories about the impacts of CGMs and AI scribes.

articles.title: Tech giants prepare to challenge state AI regulations
articles.summary: Tech companies including OpenAI, Meta Platforms Inc. and Alphabet Inc.'s Google are revving up to block US states from regulating their fast-moving and lucrative artificial intelligence businesses.

articles.title: OpenAI Model Earns Gold-Medal Score at International Math Olympiad and Advances Path to Artificial General Intelligence
articles.summary: OpenAI researchers reveal how their experimental model, devoid of any external aids, powered through hours-long proofs to earn a gold-medal score at the International Math Olympiad, discuss the projectâ€™s origins and describe how such work could help lead to artificial general intelligence

articles.title: Study finds AI tools may weaken physician skills to detect cancer
articles.summary: Study finds that artificial intelligence exposure may reduce doctors' cancer detection rates during standard colonoscopies by 6%, raising concerns about AI dependency.

articles.title: GSA strikes Google AI deal for federal agencies
articles.summary: The General Services Administration struck a deal with Google for artificial intelligence tools as part of the OneGov procurement initiative targeting federal government efficiency.

articles.title: Meta freezes AI hiring after $14B spending spree and costly talent poaching: Is the AI bubble bursting?
articles.summary: Meta has slammed the brakes on hiring for its artificial intelligence division, a sudden pause that follows one of the most expensive talent grabs Silicon Valley has seen in years. The move, first reported by The Wall Street Journal, marks the end of a spending spree in which the company acquired more than 50 high-profile AI researchers and

articles.title: Meta Freezes AI Hiring as Surging Costs Raise Concerns, Report Says
articles.summary: Meta Platforms reportedly has frozen hiring in its high-profile artificial intelligence division as investors grow concerned about the unit's surging costs.

articles.title: Google Is Trying Everything to Sell AI to Skeptics
articles.summary: The launch of new Pixel devices featured a long lineup of celebrities and influencers paid to make the case for artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Google Is Trying Everything to Sell AI to Skeptics

articles.title: Warren Brodey, 101, dies; a visionary at the dawn of the Information Age
articles.summary: Warren Brodey, who used his background as a psychiatrist to develop wide-ranging ideas about the liberating possibilities of technology at the dawn of the information age -- ideas that helped lay the groundwork for revolutionary fields like artificial intelligence -- died on Aug. 10 at his home in Oslo, Norway. He was 101.
